file.name: EnterpriseArchitecture.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Enterprise Architecture
  description: Define and maintain comprehensive business architectural definitions/blueprints to help organize/direct the business
  version: 10.0.0
servers:
- description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
  url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/BIAN-3/EnterpriseArchitecture/10.0.0
paths:
  /EnterpriseArchitecture/{enterprisearchitectureId}/Capture:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - EnterpriseArchitectureSpecification
      summary: CaCR Capture Business Architecture Specification activity or event related information
      description: CaCR Capture Business Architecture Specification activity or event related information
      operationId: Capture
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/EnterpriseArchitectureID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/EnterpriseArchitectureSpecification'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CaptureEnterpriseArchitectureSpecificationResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /EnterpriseArchitecture/{enterprisearchitectureId}/Control:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - EnterpriseArchitectureSpecification
      summary: CoCR Control the processing of Business Architecture Specification
      description: CoCR Control the processing of Business Architecture Specification

        401:

        403:

        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /EnterpriseArchitecture/{enterprisearchitectureId}/Exchange:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - EnterpriseArchitectureSpecification
      summary: EcCR Accept, verify, etc. aspects of Business Architecture Specification processing
      description: EcCR Accept, verify, etc. aspects of Business Architecture Specification processing
      operationId: Exchange
      parameters:

    post:

      description: InCR Instantiate a new Business Architecture Specification
      operationId: Initiate
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/EnterpriseArchitectureSpecification'
      responses:
